back.text:
Implemented a standardized landscape back layout with title, subtitle, category badges, text panel, image panel, and link list, matching your screenshot style and keeping the existing palette/typography. Fronts are unchanged. The unified editor preview now shows the landscape back for WYSIWYG.


What changed
- css/poster-v2.css: new landscape back layout, panel styling, badges, and grid structure.
- js/loadPosters.js: back HTML structure updated to the standardized layout + category badges.
- js/unified-editor.js: preview back updated to match layout + category badge from selected category.
- css/editor.css: preview back rotates into landscape with scale to fit.
